about.text: For exchange we don't require neither login nor password and none of your personal data
We guarantee a special rate for the exchange of the amount 1 BTC and more
The exchange doesn't charge commission for buying/selling BTC, you pay only the network fee
The service works directly with blockchain wallets and doesn't keep your funds

limitExceededPopup.header: Exceeded the limit of available funds {currency}
limitExceededPopup.text1: We apologize for any inconvinience. Now is available {availableAmountOut} {currencyOut}.
limitExceededPopup.text2: You can place an order and the number of tokens you need will be automatically transferred to your account as the funds appear on the service.

maypayExceededPopup.text1: We apologize for any inconvinience. Service can accept only as much as {mayPay} {currencyIn}.
maypayExceededPopup.text2: You can place an order and the number of tokens you need will be automatically transferred to your account when the amount of {currencyIn} will decrease and there will be enough {currencyOut} tokens.

checkboxes.order: I understand the application for an exchange will be executed when a sufficient amount of funds appears on the service and the exchange rate will be taken at the moment of execution
checkboxes.licenses: I've read and agree to the "Face to Face" {terms_of_use_link} and {privacy_policy_link}

message: The exchange rate will be fixed for 30 minutes to confirm the transaction in the blockchain.
You can check the operation by the account number in the payment list

agreementsPopup.header: Please, confirm that you read and agreed to all terms of transaction.

payments_page.generalError: Unexpected error occured, try again later.

tabs.title: How to exchange cryptocurrency?
tabs.text:
For example you want to exchange ETH to BTC.

1. On the main page of the website in a special form select the currency you want to exchange (ETH) from the list and enter it's amount.
2. Select the currency you want to receive (BTC). The exchange will automatically calculate the amount you will recieve.
3. To process an exchange request click the "Exchange" button.
4. On the exchange registration page you will see the information about the course and the commission.
5. In order for the application to get into the work read and agree with the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
6. After agreeing with the mentioned documents the account number of the exchange will appear to which you must transfer ETH, and the field in which you need to enter your account number to receive the BTC is will be unlocked.

The application will be automatically executed after the incoming to the Face to Face account of the tokens that you want to exchange.

tabs.title: How long does it take to transfer funds?
tabs.text: In case the requested volume of tokens exceeded the available amount of funds on the exchanger, the application will be executed upon appearance of sufficient quantity of cryptocurrency on the service. The funds will be automatically transferred to your account at the rate at the time of execution of the application.
